Seinfeld actor Richard Herd has died at age 87.A rep for Herd told The Wrap that the veteran character actor died of cancer-related causes, surrounded by his family at home in Los Angeles.

articles.title: Jimmy Fallon ‘cancelled’ on Twitter over blackface sketch from 2000 - NEWS.com.au
